ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] [egbarts] OT: Changing computers
ygData.msgSnippet: Can t you just copy them :) They are the .opt files in the EQ directory. I seem to remember doing that before when I switched hard drives. I just copied the
ygData.messageBody:
Can't you just copy them :)
They are the .opt files in the EQ directory.
I seem to remember doing that before when I switched hard drives.
I just copied the whole thing across though but the opt files are the ones
you need I think.

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: 06 March 2000 14:00
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] [egbarts] Changing computers


From: Papa Legba <legba@...>

I have a cable modem, so the patching won't be too awful. My roomate
started in November, and it wasn't too bad then. I was more concerned
withg losing all my hot keys and such. Between my cleric and bard and I
have almost the entire bank of socials and all 6 hot key banks filled
now. It will be a pain to redo them all... Well I get the new toy
today, so we'll see how it goes...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
